details.callToWorship: Greater Is He That Is in Me #437
details.fellowshipSong: What a Friend We Have in Jesus #182

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: We thank God for the support and resources for our booth at Shaping Clay Jubilee!
We will hold a treat giveaway during county trick or treat hours on Thursday, 10/31 from 5:00-7:00 PM. Please consider setting up and/or donating candy.
Subscribe to our church YouTube channel: youtube.com/@manchesterbaptist
